title: Data Pipeline - Flatten Data
description: Master array flattening with flat() and flatMap(). Transform nested arrays into single-level structures and handle complex hierarchical data.

concepts.flat: Flattens nested arrays by specified depth
concepts.flatMap: Maps then flattens in single operation
concepts.depth: How many levels of nesting to flatten
concepts.recursive_structures: Data with multiple levels of nesting

learning_outcomes: Use flat() to flatten nested arrays
Use flatMap() for mapping and flattening
